data.title: 1835 Dark Horse Rd UNIT A, Reno, NV 89521
data.meta_description: 1835 Dark Horse Rd UNIT A, Reno, NV 89521 is pending. Zillow has 38 photos of this 2 beds, 2 baths, 1,310 Square Feet condo home with a list price of $430,000.
data.text: Discover the allure of South Reno living with this stylish 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo nestled in the highly sought after Esplanade at Damonte Ranch, this contemporary residence offers convenience a with gym access & park proximity. Pride of ownership displayed throughout, the well maintained unit has large southeast facing windows allowing for tons of natural light to pour into the home. There is a deep, attached one car garage with direct unit access. Walk upstairs to the living area, and enter into the Living Area. The inviting living room perfect for relaxation or entertaining guests. The Sleek, modern kitchen equipped with whirlpool/LG appliances and ample storage space. Private balcony offering Southeast Sky views, and is a perfect spot for morning coffee or evening unwind. Two generously sized bedrooms featuring plush carpets and ample closet space. The home features two bathrooms with updated fixtures and finishes. Other ammenitties include TANKLESS WATER HEATER, central AC, community gym access. Ideally situated in South Reno, close to shopping, dining, and entertainment. This condo combines modern conveniences with a prime location, making it an exceptional choice for those seeking a vibrant lifestyle in South Reno. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this your new home sweet home!
